Item ID3101

Rune claws are a two handed melee weapon, requiring 40 Attack to wield. They are the second strongest pair of claws.

Rune claws can be obtained either through smithing or looting ninja implings. They can be made at level 98 Smithing with two runite bars after completion of the Death Plateau quest, granting 150 Smithing experience.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player using the rune claws' special attack, Impale.

Rune claws have a special attack, Impale, which consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy and deals 10% increased damage. The special attack increases the time until the next attack by one tick (0.6 seconds) and delays the actual special attack itself by the same amount of time.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • They are one of only two rune metal weapons to have a special attack, the other being the rune throwing axe.

[[File:Rune claws detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Rune claws''' are a two handed melee weapon, requiring 40 [[Attack]] to wield. They are the second strongest pair of [[claws]].

Rune claws can be obtained either through [[smithing]] or looting [[ninja impling|ninja implings]]. They can be made at level 98 Smithing with two [[runite bars]] after completion of the [[Death Plateau]] quest, granting 150 Smithing experience.

==Combat styles==

==Special attack==
[[File:Impale.gif|thumb|230px|A player using the rune claws' special attack, ''Impale''.]]
Rune claws have a [[special attack]], ''Impale'', which consumes 25% of the player's special attack energy and deals 10% increased damage. The special attack increases the time until the next attack by one tick (0.6 seconds) and delays the actual special attack itself by the same amount of time.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Rune claws}}

==Trivia==
* They are one of only two rune metal weapons to have a special attack, the other being the [[rune throwing axe]].
